width.description: Width of image, e.g., '80%'. Defaults to 100%.

hotspots.description: Active clickable locations within the image map

shape.description: Shape of the hotspot within the image.  Currently 'circle','rect', 'poly', and 'default' are the shapes allowed.

coordinates.description: Coordinates of the hotspot in the picture, referenced to the top-left of the image. rect: [X0%  Y0% X1% Y2%], circle:[X0%, Y0%, Radius% (radius % relative to image width)], poly: [X0% Y0%...Xn% Yn%],  'default':sets all area that hasn't already been specified.  Coordinates defined later will overwrite earlier coordinates

correct.description: set the hotspot to the correct answer

other.description: If enabled, an 'other' text input will show up below the image when the hotspot it clicked
